name: Weight Loss
description: Lose excess body fat while maintaining muscle mass. Ideal for individuals with a BMI above 25.

name: Muscle Gain
description: Build lean muscle mass through strength training and proper nutrition. Suitable for gym-goers looking to bulk up.

name: Endurance Improvement
description: Enhance cardiovascular endurance and stamina through aerobic exercises like running, cycling, or swimming.

name: Injury Recovery (Lower Body)
description: Focus on rehabilitation exercises for lower body injuries such as knee sprains or ankle strains. Avoid high-impact activities.

name: Injury Recovery (Upper Body)
description: Rehabilitate upper body injuries like shoulder dislocations or wrist fractures using low-intensity resistance training.

name: Mobility and Flexibility
description: Improve joint mobility and flexibility through yoga, stretching, and dynamic movement exercises. Ideal for seniors or those recovering from injuries.

name: General Health Maintenance
description: Maintain a healthy lifestyle by balancing diet, exercise, and rest. Focus on achieving a BMI in the healthy range.

name: Strength Training for Beginners
description: Introduce yourself to strength training with basic compound movements like squats, deadlifts, and push-ups. Aim to build foundational strength.

name: Post-Pregnancy Fitness
description: Regain fitness after pregnancy through low-impact cardio and core-strengthening exercises. Focus on gradual weight loss and muscle toning.

name: Athletic Performance Enhancement
description: Optimize athletic performance with a combination of strength, speed, and agility training. Suitable for competitive athletes.
